mapper.sql: lc.loan_code, lc.id, cobo_name, dict_sex, cert_num, dict_household_province, dict_household_city, dict_household_area, household_address, mobile, family_tel, dict_marry_status, have_child_flag, dict_live_province, dict_live_city, dict_live_area, now_address, email, contact_is_know, dict_relation_type, dict_relation_customer, house_other, dict_social_security, lc.create_by, lc.create_time, lc.modify_by, lc.modify_time
mapper.select: SELECT d1.label dict_sex, d2.label dict_marry_status, d3.label have_child_flag, d4.label dict_contact_relation, cp.dict_contact_now_address, concat(p1.area_name, c1.area_name, a1.area_name, lc.household_address) dict_household_province, concat(p2.area_name, c2.area_name, a2.area_name, lc.now_address) dict_live_province, , cp.id bCId, cp.loan_code bCLoanCode, cp.contact_name, cp.dict_contact_relation, cp.contact_uint, cp.dict_contact_now_address, cp.contact_unit_tel FROM jk.t_cj_loan_coborrower lc LEFT JOIN t_cj_customer_contact_person cp ON cp.loan_code = lc.loan_code AND cp.r_customer_coborrower_code = lc.id AND cp.loan_customter_type = #{loanType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LEFT JOIN t_gl_dict d1 ON d1.value = lc.dict_sex AND d1.type = 'jk_sex' LEFT JOIN t_gl_dict d2 ON d2.value = lc.dict_marry_status AND d2.type = 'jk_marriage' LEFT JOIN t_gl_dict d3 ON d3.value = lc.have_child_flag AND d3.type = 'jk_have_or_nohave' LEFT JOIN t_gl_dict d4 ON d4.value = cp.dict_contact_relation AND d4.type = 'jk_relation_type' LEFT JOIN (select * from t_gl_province_city where area_code not in ('310000', '120000', '500000', '110000')) p1 ON p1.area_code = lc.dict_household_province LEFT JOIN t_gl_province_city c1 ON c1.area_code = lc.dict_household_city LEFT JOIN t_gl_province_city a1 ON a1.area_code = lc.dict_household_area LEFT JOIN (select * from t_gl_province_city where area_code not in ('310000', '120000', '500000', '110000')) p2 ON p2.area_code = lc.dict_live_province LEFT JOIN t_gl_province_city c2 ON c2.area_code = lc.dict_live_city LEFT JOIN t_gl_province_city a2 ON a2.area_code = lc.dict_live_area WHERE lc.loan_code = #{loanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
